title: Go chat yourself with Facebook’s new Portal companion app
text: Ignoring calls that it’s creepy, Facebook is forging onward with its Portal smart display. Today Facebook quietly launched iOS and Android Portal apps that let owners show off photos on the screen without sharing them to the social network, and video call their home while they’re out.

title: Facebook Board Members Are Puppets for Zuckerberg, NorthStar's Goodridge Says
text: Julie Goodridge, NorthStar Asset Management chief executive officer, explains why she has submitted a proposal to Facebook Inc.'s board of directors for a shareholder vote on changing the company's dual-class voting structure. She speaks with Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu and Romaine Bostick on "Bloomberg Markets: The Close."

title: Social Stocks: 3 trades
text: The "Fast Money" traders give you 3 trades in Facebook as the user engagement seems to be slowing.

title: Canadian lawmakers fume after Facebook's Zuckerberg snubs invitation
text: Canadian lawmakers fumed on Tuesday when Facebook Inc founder and Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg snubbed an invitation to Ottawa to testify on privacy and democracy before an international panel, slapping the billionaire with a standing summons.

title: How Should Facebook Approach Free Speech On Its Platforms?
text: Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) is no stranger to controversy, and one of the latest controversial actions by the world’s largest social media company involved banning a handful of popular users such as Alex Jones, Milo Yiannopoulos and Laura Loomer.

title: I quit Facebook — but it's getting harder to resist the pull back in
text: I quit social media a few years ago to make my life better and easier, which it has. But Facebook has also completely reshaped community organization and interaction and it's getting harder to resist the urge to jump back in.

title: What is Facebook’s GlobalCoin?
text: Social media giant Facebook could quickly become a powerful player in the cryptocurrency and digital payments markets.

title: Evaluating Facebook's 'GlobalCoin' Cryptocurrency
text: Facebook is planning to launch its own cryptocurrency in many major markets by Q1 2020.

title: 5 Growth Stocks Turning Into Value Stocks
text: The point of big valuations on growth stocks is that the stocks will one day grow into those valuations. These stocks have already done that.

title: Facebook as we knew it...is over, says Recode's Kara Swisher
text: Recode's editor-at-large and CNBC contributor Kara Swisher joins the "Squawk Alley" team to break down Facebook's decision not to remove a doctored video of Nancy Pelosi from its platform.
